description:
As the Reapers` Game nears its end, http://anidb.net/ch111128 [Neku], http://anidb.net/ch111127 [Shiki], http://anidb.net/ch111129 [Beat], and http://anidb.net/ch111131 [Rhyme] get a mission so easy it seems like a day off. Is this a respite before their looming battle with the Game Master, or one last trap to stop them from ever reaching it?
Source: Funimation
